title: Electoral Process (Revision of Wards) Order, 2021
content:
14thMay,2021 Statutory Instruments 437
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORYINSTRUMENTNO.57of 2021
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(ActNo.35of2016)
The Electoral Process (Revision of Wards) Order, 2021
IN EXERCISE of powers contained in section 25 of the Electoral
ProcessAct,thefollowingOrderismade
1. ThisOrdermaybecitedastheElectoralProcess(Revision Title
ofWards)Order,2021.
2. ThenumberofwardsintheRepublicofZambiaisrevised Revisionof
from1,624to1,858. numberof
wards
3. The names of the 1,858 wards referred to in paragraph 2 Namesof
areas setout inthe Schedule. wards
4. Thecopiesoftheboundarydescriptionsofthewardsnamed Inspection
intheScheduleareavailableforinspectionbythemembersofthe
public at the Commission headoffice and at the respective City,
MunicipalorDistrictCouncils.
5. Thewardsreferredtointhe Schedulewhichdidnot exist Effective
prior tothe commencementofthese Regulationsshall comeinto Date
existenceonthenextdissolutionoftheCouncilfollowingthecoming
CopiesofthisStatutoryInstrumentcanbeobtainedfromtheGovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101Lusaka.PriceK92.00each.
